languages.text: "Я все чаше и чаще слышу о том, как худо идут дела в Просторе, да от каждого второго... хмф! Да если и так — владения фон Валанциус не падут под ударами судьбы, даже под самыми тяжелыми. Выше голову, Лорд-капитан: не время унывать и оплакивать свою судьбу".

"There's more and more talk of how poorly things are going in the Expanse — some days it seems I can't take two steps without hearing some peasant pontificating on the matter, hmph! Even if it is as dire as they say, the von Valancius realm will not crumble under the blows of fate, no matter how devastating. Chin up, Lord Captain! This is no time to lose heart and lament your lot."
languages.original_text: "Я все чаше и чаще слышу о том, как худо идут дела в Просторе, да от каждого второго... хмф! Да если и так — владения фон Валанциус не падут под ударами судьбы, даже под самыми тяжелыми. Выше голову, Лорд-капитан: не время унывать и оплакивать свою судьбу".

traits.locale_text: "More and more often, I hear talks about how poorly things are going in the Koronus — why, it must be every other slob who's complaining at this point, hmph! Even if it is as dire as they say, the von Valancius realm shall not crumble under the blows of fate, no matter how devastating. Hold your head up high, Lord Captain! This is no time to feel despondent and lament your own fate."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "More and more often, I hear talks about how poorly things are going in the Koronus — why, it must be every other slob who's complaining at this point, hmph! traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “越来越多的人都在谈论科罗努斯扩区的情况有多么糟糕。有的时候，我甚至都不用走几步路，就能听到某些农奴在忙着证明这件事情，啧！就算情况真的像他们说得那么糟糕，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝也绝不会被打垮，无论命运多么严酷。抬起头来，舰长大人！现在可不是灰心丧气，哀叹时运不济的时候。”
languages.original_text: "There's more and more talk of how poorly things are going in the Expanse — some days it seems I can't take two steps without hearing some peasant pontificating on the matter, hmph! Even if it is as dire as they say, the von Valancius realm will not crumble under the blows of fate, no matter how devastating. Chin up, Lord Captain! This is no time to lose heart and lament your lot."

traits.locale_text: “越来越多的人都在谈论科罗努斯扩区的情况有多么糟糕。有的时候，我甚至都不用走几步路，就能听到某些农民在忙着证明这件事情，啧！就算情况真的像他们说得那么糟糕，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝也绝不会被打垮，无论命运多么严酷。抬起头来，舰长大人！现在可不是灰心丧气，哀叹时运不济的时候。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Cada vez se habla más de la situación pésima de la Extensión. Algunos días no se pueden ni dar dos pasos sin escuchar cómo un campesino da lecciones sobre el asunto. ¡Bah! Aun si fuera tan terrible como insinúan, el dominio von Valancius no caerá por muy negro que se augure el destino. ¡Ánimo, Lord Capitán! No es el momento de perder la esperanza y lamentarse».
languages.original_text: "There's more and more talk of how poorly things are going in the Expanse — some days it seems I can't take two steps without hearing some peasant pontificating on the matter, hmph! Even if it is as dire as they say, the von Valancius realm will not crumble under the blows of fate, no matter how devastating. Chin up, Lord Captain! This is no time to lose heart and lament your lot."

traits.locale_text: «Cada vez se habla más de la situación pésima de la Extensión. Algunos días no se pueden ni dar dos pasos sin escuchar cómo un campesino da lecciones sobre el asunto. ¡Bah! Aun si fuera tan terrible como insinúan, el dominio von Valancius no caerá por muy negro que se augure el destino. ¡Ánimo, Lord Capitán! No es el momento de perder la esperanza y lamentarse».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「エクスパンスの状況はますます悪化しているとの噂です――ある時は外に出てから2歩も経たずに、どこぞの労働者がこの問題について演説しているのを聞いたくらいだ！たとえ彼らが言うように悲惨な状況であっても、フォン・ヴァランシウスの領域はどれほど壊滅的な運命の潮流に飲まれても屈することはありません。気張りましょう、ロード・キャプテン！気を落としたり、自分の境遇を嘆いている暇はありません」
languages.original_text: "There's more and more talk of how poorly things are going in the Expanse — some days it seems I can't take two steps without hearing some peasant pontificating on the matter, hmph! Even if it is as dire as they say, the von Valancius realm will not crumble under the blows of fate, no matter how devastating. Chin up, Lord Captain! This is no time to lose heart and lament your lot."

traits.locale_text: 「エクスパンスの状況はますます悪化しているとの噂です――ある時は外に出てから2歩も経たずに、どこぞの労働者がこの問題について演説しているのを聞いたくらいだ！たとえ彼らが言うように悲惨な状況であっても、フォン・ヴァランシウスの領域はどれほど壊滅的な運命の潮流に飲まれても屈することはありません。気張りましょう、ロード・キャプテン！気を落としたり、自分の境遇を嘆いている暇はありません」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Es gibt immer mehr Gerede darüber, wie schlecht alles in der Ausdehnung läuft – an manchen Tagen kann ich keine zwei Schritte tun, ohne zu hören, wie sich irgendein Bauer über die Sache auslässt, hmpf! Selbst wenn es wirklich so schlimm ist, wie sie sagen, wird das Reich derer von Valancius nicht unter den Schlägen des Schicksals zusammenbrechen, so vernichtend sie auch sein mögen. Kopf hoch, Lord Captain! Jetzt ist nicht der Zeitpunkt, den Kopf hängen zu lassen und Euer Los zu beklagen."
languages.original_text: "There's more and more talk of how poorly things are going in the Expanse — some days it seems I can't take two steps without hearing some peasant pontificating on the matter, hmph! Even if it is as dire as they say, the von Valancius realm will not crumble under the blows of fate, no matter how devastating. Chin up, Lord Captain! This is no time to lose heart and lament your lot."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt immer mehr Gerede darüber, wie schlecht alles in der Ausdehnung läuft – an manchen Tagen kann ich keine zwei Schritte tun, ohne zu hören, wie sich irgendein Bauer über die Sache auslässt, hmpf! Selbst wenn es wirklich so schlimm ist, wie sie sagen, wird das Reich derer von Valancius nicht unter den Schlägen des Schicksals zusammenbrechen, so vernichtend sie auch sein mögen. Kopf hoch, Lord Captain! Jetzt ist nicht der Zeitpunkt, den Kopf hängen zu lassen und Euer Los zu beklagen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « On parle de plus en plus de la situation déplorable dans les Étendues de Koronus. Certains jours, je ne peux faire deux pas sans qu'un manant ne fasse de grands discours sur le sujet... Hmph. Cela dit, même si les choses vont aussi mal que ce qu'ils prétendent, le royaume des von Valancius ne s'écroulera pas sous les coups du sort, aussi dévastateurs soient-ils. Alors haut les cœurs, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Ce n'est pas le moment de perdre courage ou de nous lamenter. »
languages.original_text: "There's more and more talk of how poorly things are going in the Expanse — some days it seems I can't take two steps without hearing some peasant pontificating on the matter, hmph! Even if it is as dire as they say, the von Valancius realm will not crumble under the blows of fate, no matter how devastating. Chin up, Lord Captain! This is no time to lose heart and lament your lot."

traits.locale_text: « On parle de plus en plus de la situation déplorable dans les Étendues de Koronus. Certains jours, je ne peux faire deux pas sans qu'un manant ne fasse de grands discours sur le sujet... Hmph. Cela dit, même si les choses vont aussi mal que ce qu'ils prétendent, le royaume des von Valancius ne s'écroulera pas sous les coups du sort, aussi dévastateurs soient-ils. Alors haut les cœurs, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Ce n'est pas le moment de perdre courage ou de nous lamenter. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Enginlik'te işlerin ne denli kötüye gittiğine dair konuşmalar günbegün artıyor. Peh, bazı günler zırcahilin tekinin bilgiçliğine rastlamadan iki adım bile atamıyorum! Durum dedikleri kadar vahimse dahi von Valancius diyarı, ne kadar ağır olursa olsun feleğin sillesi karşısında yıkılmayacak. Başınızı dik tutun Lord Kaptan! Vakit, cesaretimizi yitirme ve talihe lanet okuma vakti değildir."
languages.original_text: "There's more and more talk of how poorly things are going in the Expanse — some days it seems I can't take two steps without hearing some peasant pontificating on the matter, hmph! Even if it is as dire as they say, the von Valancius realm will not crumble under the blows of fate, no matter how devastating. Chin up, Lord Captain! This is no time to lose heart and lament your lot."

traits.locale_text: "Enginlik'te her şeyin ne kadar da kötü gittiğine dair konuşmalar her geçen gün artıyor, bazı günler köylünün birinin bilgiçlik tasladığını duymadan iki adım bile atamıyorum gibi geliyor, peh! Eğer durum dedikleri kadar kötüyse bile von Valancius diyarı kaderin oyunları nedeniyle yıkılmayacak, bu oyunlar ne kadar tahrip edici olurlarsa olsunlar. Başınızı dik tutun Lord Kaptan! Cesaretinizi yitirme ve kayıplarınızın ardından ağıt yakma zamanı değil."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
